id:
Check FasTrak online every two weeks to make disputes
NextBigFuture.com
paragraph:
Bay Area FasTrak only provides you with a paper bill every 3 months. However, they will only reverse invalid disputed charges that are less than 30 days old.You can change to monthly free email billing, but charges over 30 days old will not be changed and you would review and dispute immediately.Also, a reminder to change the Fastrak device to Flex Fastrak and keep it set on 3. If you do not have Flex Fastrak device and have it set on 3 then you will be charged for using carpool lanes in I580 and I680 and any future carpool toll lanes.Fastrak only lets you indicate the month you want to dispute. You need login and file disputes if there are any invalid carpool or bridge tolls.
